name: RTCAnswerOptions
description: The RTCAnswerOptions dictionary is used to provide optional settings when creating an SDP answer using RTCPeerConnection.createOffer() after receiving an offer from a remote peer.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'RTCAnswerOptions' in the 'WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers' specification.
